name: Union Station
description: James Paru is a state detective who's going on a personal vacation for the first time in 10 years to St. Louis where he grew up. He's spent most of his life putting others before himself and solving some big cases that put him where he is. All he wants is to relax and reexplore the city, but an unknown force has other plans for him and the hotel he's staying in. James must now search the hotel and choose what to do next: save the hotel, save himself, or maybe something else.
